incidents.name: Site incident impacting multiple parts of our site

incident_updates.body: There was a site incident which impacted multiple parts of our site. During the incident, users may encounter an error on certain parts of our site. The site incident has been resolved and our site should be working normally now.

incidents.name: Analyze Page Loading Issues

incident_updates.body: Reports of users not being able to scroll past Q3 on Analyze page, as well as some errors when exporting Summary Data. The issues have all now been resolved.

incidents.name: Issue creating MaxDiff surveys

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are aware of an issue with creating MaxDiff surveys. When the initial setup is complete, no questions are added to the survey and the option to add questions isn't working. This issue is currently under investigation.

incidents.name: Homepage Down

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Intermittent errors affecting the download and upload of multilingual language files

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Delays in processing of response-related events for webhook callbacks and integration synchs

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Our processing of response-related events is running behind which is causing a backlog and a delay of 20+ mins. No data has been lost and the system should be caught up shortly. This only affects callbacks to users of our Developer API, or any installed app which relies on those events, including our Salesforce and Marketo integrations (for synching of responses only).

incidents.name: NPS scores not rendering in survey Dashboards

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Blank pages across the site

incident_updates.body: Issues have been resolved and the site is loading as expected now.
A fix for the issue is in progress and services are recovering. Previously blank pages now loading again.
Our team is investigating an issue that is causing some pages across our site to not load.

incidents.name: Survey page is loading slowly or returning errors

incident_updates.body: Our site experienced an issue that caused survey pages to load slowly or return errors for some respondents. This lasted for about an hour but has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey Rewards users cannot cash out their rewards

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to work on a fix. Note that this issue does not impact all SurveyMonkey Reward users attempting to cash out.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Unable to download exports from Analyze Results page

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
⚠️ We're aware of an issue impacting the downloading of Analyze exports and we are investigating the cause.

incidents.name: Users cannot log into SurveyMonkey mobile

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Analyze Results / Shared Data Page not loading

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Issue with viewing Maxdiff survey

incident_updates.body: This issue is now resolved
We are investigating an issue that's preventing some customers from viewing or exporting the results of a Maxdiff survey

incidents.name: Users based in Canada having trouble exporting from Analyze Results

incident_updates.body: The issue is now resolved and all Canadian users should be able export their data without issue.
We're currently aware of an issue impacting our users in Canada where Analyze Results is prevented from being able to export a survey's data. Our team is looking into the issue.

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey customer's who are using a lanuage other than English are unable to create surveys. Non English Shared Data Pages are failing to load.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
Resolved: This issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are actively investigating.

incidents.name: Users based in Canada having trouble accessing Analyze Results

incident_updates.body: This incident is now resolved. Users in Canada can now access Analyze Results as expected.
We're currently aware of an issue impacting our users in Canada where Analyze Results can't be accessed. Our team is looking into the issue.

incidents.name: Unable to edit user billing details

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Email Collector invites encountering a 404 error

incident_updates.body: The issue is now resolved and the majority of users should now be able access their survey invites without error, but for anyone still seeing an error, a clear of their browser cache (not cookies) should fix it immediately.
A fix has been implemented and we are actively monitoring.
⚠️ We've isolated the problem and our teams are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

⚠️ We're aware of an issue impacting survey respondents that are either clicking "begin survey" (or answering an embedded first question) in an Email Collector invitation message, and we are investigating the cause. This issue doesn't affect other collector types.

incidents.name: NPS question converted to rating scale question in some surveys

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix was implemented. It resolved the issue for most surveys affected by this issue. There are some surveys with complications which have not been fixed yet.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Site issue impacting paid features

incident_updates.body:
There was a site issue from approximately 1:05-1:25PM (Pacific Time) which affected users' ability to access paid features on our site. Numerous features were impacted. This issue has been fixed.

If you experienced an issue using a paid feature during this time frame, it's likely that you were impacted by this incident. Please try again now as the issue has been fixed.

incidents.name: Issues accessing the Collect Responses page for some surveys

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey Contribute

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
Project completion may be delayed, and response quality could be impacted. Our engineers are actively investigating. We appreciate your understanding and apologize for the inconvenience.

incidents.name: Login prompts appearing on Help Center pages for logged-in users on the EU data center

incident_updates.body: This issue has been resolved and EU customers should now be able to log in on Help Center pages.

The Help Center and contact flow pages are currently prompting customers logged in to an account on the European Data Center to log in. For those impacted, you can still contact support via the logged-out options on the help center while this issue is being investigated, and you can also contact the support team directly by emailing support@surveymonkey.com from the email address associated with your account.

incidents.name: No contacts added to email invitation message even though there are valid contacts, preventing the sending of email messages

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Issue at checkout when scheduling SurveyMonkey Audience project

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Facebook signups and logins are failing

incident_updates.body: The issue has been resolved. Facebook sign-ups and logins are now working.
We are aware of an issue with Facebook signups and logins. This is due to an issue with an upstream provider. We are working to resolve this issue.

incidents.name: Issue with the Plans and Pricing page

incident_updates.body: The issue has been resolved. The Plans & Pricing page is loading and working as expected.
We're currently aware of an issue with the Plans & Pricing page. Users may experience slowness or see an error. Our team is investigating and monitoring the issue.

incidents.name: Survey web link not loading for some surveys

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: My Team: Manage Users→User→Manage Surveys page not loading for admins

incident_updates.body: The issue is now resolved.
⚠️ We're aware of an issue impacting the My Teams feature on our Enterprise Plan, and we are investigating the cause.

incidents.name: Design survey page unresponsive for surveys in some accounts

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Resolved - 5xx errors when accessing Developer API

incident_updates.body: ✅ We observed an impact on the availability of the Developer API this morning between 9:07-11:20am PST; the issue is now resolved.

incidents.name: Issue with device verification

incident_updates.body: This issue is resolved
We are aware of an issue that's causing some customers to see an error when trying to verify a device.

incidents.name: Error showing on https://fr.surveymonkey.com/

incident_updates.body: This issue is now resolved
We are currently investigating an issue that's causing errors to show on https://fr.surveymonkey.com/

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey Audience projects halted

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved. SurveyMonkey Audience projects from here should launch correctly.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating an issue where SurveyMonkey Audience projects are being halted.

incidents.name: Multiple services like the Analyze and Survey Taking experience down

incident_updates.body: All services have recovered and issues are now resolved. The site is loading as expected.
The majority of impacted services are in recovery and we are continuing to monitor them.
We have identified the root cause and are continue to work on a solution.
We're currently aware of an issue impacting the survey-taking experience and Analyze page. Users may encounter "We're Sorry" errors. Our team is investigating the issue.

incidents.name: Audience Panel Impacted

incident_updates.body: This incident is now resolved. All audience panel projects are completing as expected.

No updates from our panel partner that is impacted at this time. Users may notice that their audience projects are marked as complete with no responses or perpetually active. We'll continue to update here.
We're currently aware of an issue with our panel partner. This may cause projects with international panelists to complete with 0 responses. We're looking into the issue.

incidents.name: Custom Theme not showing on survey page for surveys hosted on our EU data centers

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Van Westerndorp - “Add Stimulus” section in setup section is not editable

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
Issue resolved

We're currently experiencing an issue on our Van Westendorp Solution, where the “Add Stimulus” section in the setup is not editable and does not display the rich text editor. Our engineers are actively investigating.

incidents.name: Survey taking experience down

incident_updates.body: Starting at 12:40pm PST the survey-taking experience was down for users. As of 1:11pm PST the issue was resolved. Users can take surveys with no errors or problems now.

incidents.name: Error showing when trying to access Analyze page

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

We are currently investigating an issue with the Analyze page. Our team is hard at work on getting everything back up to speed, and things should be back to normal soon. We apologize for the inconvenience.

incidents.name: Collect page failing to load

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue and Collect pages are now loading for all customers.
We are investigating an issue where the Collect page is failing to load for some customers.

incidents.name: Errors with survey taking

incident_updates.body: The issue is now resolved and all users should be able access and take a survey.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
⚠️ We've isolated the problem and our teams are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
⚠️ We're aware of an issue impacting survey taking, and we are investigating the cause.

incidents.name: Analyze Results Down

incident_updates.body: The issue has been resolved and Analyze Results is now loading as expected for Canadian Data Center users.
The issue has been identified. There is ongoing impact on users in our Canadian data center trying to access Analyze Results.

We're aware of an issue that is impacting Canadian user's ability to view their data in Analyze Results. Users can still export their data. Not all users are impacted at this time. Our team is currently investigating the issue.

incidents.name: Invalid Recaptcha error when installing an app from App Directory

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
Issue has been identified and a fix is being worked on.
⚠️ We're aware of an issue impacting the installation of new apps (existing apps unaffected and remain operational) and we are investigating the cause.

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey Rewards - images and other web assets not loading

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are aware of an issue where images and other web assets are not loading in the SurveyMonkey Rewards app. This issue is being investigated.

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey site slow to load

incident_updates.body: Load times are back to normal. Incident has been resolved.
Issue and load times seem to be recovering.
We are investigating an issue with the SurveyMonkey site being slow to load.

incidents.name: Dashboard failing to load

incident_updates.body: All services have fully recovered. Users should no longer experience any errors when accessing the dashboard or collectors.
In addition to the dashboard page, users may experience errors when creating collectors for their surveys.
Our team is aware of an issue that is causing users to see an error on the Dashboard page. Our team is investigating and has identified the cause.

incidents.name: New surveys being created with incorrect theme. Customers on Basic plan incorrectly seeing error that survey has paid features

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are aware of an issue where new surveys are being created with an incorrect theme. Also customers on Basic plans are incorrectly seeing an error that paid features have been added to new surveys. Our team is hard at work on getting everything back up to speed, and things should be back to normal soon.

incidents.name: Analyze page is not loading for users on our Canadian Data Centre

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
⚠️ We're aware of an issue impacting Analyze page loading, and we are investigating the cause.
